altername_name: Yaoi Junichi Gokuhi Project: UFO o Oe!!
Yaoi Jun'ichi Gokuhi Project - UFO o Oe!!
name: Yaoi Junichi Gokuhi Project: UFO wo Oe!!
overview: Junichi Yaoi’s otherworldly encounters took place decades ago, but in his memory, it’s as if they happened yesterday. The first one was in 1972. It was about 4 o’clock on a lazy Sunday afternoon in Tokyo’s then semi-rural Setagaya Ward. For Yaoi, his experience with the paranormal was so profound that he quit his television job to make his own documentaries on the subject and teach a correspondence college course. Yaoi Junichi is the leading UFO researcher in Japan and appeared on a very select panel of paranormal experts, he also has supervised the production of a real-live UFO radar, a device that not only detects when you are in the presence of a UFO, but also can determine whether or not your dear friends are aliens. Yaoi Junichi Gokuhi Project UFO Wotsuie!! is a collection of data and videos of Yaoi Junichi investigations about UFO's, the player can read all the data and watch the videos in a video player.
